tgt_original: 乃至無法有法空亦如是。

src_original: ātmanā ca catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayitavyāni,  pare ca caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu samādāpayitavyāḥ,  caturṇāṃ ca smṛtyupasthānānāṃ varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,  ye cānye sattvāś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayanti,  teṣāṃ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena.
tgt_original: 自行四念處，亦教人行四念處，讚歎行四念處法，歡喜讚歎行四念處者；

src_original: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgāni,  ātmanā cāryaṣṭāṅgo mārgo bhāvayitavyaḥ,  pare cāryāṣṭāṅge mārge sthāpayitavyāḥ,  āryāṣṭaṅgamārgasya ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,  ye cānye sattvā āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayanti,
tgt_original: 乃至八聖道分亦如是。

src_original: teṣāṃ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ (PSP_4:138)  ātmanā ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhayo bhāvayitavyāḥ,  pare ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhau samādāpayitavyāḥ,  śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhīnāṃ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,  ye cānye sattvāḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhīn bhāvayanti,
tgt_original: 自修空三昧、無相、無作三昧，亦教人修空、無相、無作三昧，讚歎修空、無相、無作三昧法，歡喜讚歎修空、無相、無作三昧者。

src_original: ātmanā ca catvāry āryasatyāni bhāvayitavyāni,  pare cāryasatyabhāvanāyāṃ samādāpayitavyā,  āryasatyānāṃ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,  ye cānye sattvāś catvāry āryasatyāni bhāvayanti,  ātmanā cāṣṭavimokṣā bhāvayitavyāḥ,
tgt_original: 自行八背捨，亦教人行八背捨，讚歎行八背捨法，歡喜讚歎行八背捨者。

src_original: pare cāṣṭavimokṣabhāvanāyāṃ samādāpayitavyā,  aṣṭānāṃ ca vimokṣāṇāṃ varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,  ye cānye 'ṣṭavimokṣāṃ samāpadyante,  ātmanā ca navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ samādāpayitavyāḥ,
tgt_original: 自行九次第定，亦教人行九次第定，讚歎行九次第定法，歡喜讚歎行九次第定者。

src_original: pare ca navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu samādāpayitavyā,  navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,  ye cānye sattvā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ samāpadyante,  teṣāṃ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena.  ātmanā cābhijñā niṣpādayitavyāḥ,
tgt_original: 自具足佛十力，亦教人具足佛十力，讚歎具足佛十力法，歡喜讚歎具足佛十力者；

src_original: pare cābhijñāprāptaye samādāpayitavyāḥ,  abhijñānāṃ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,
tgt_original: 自行四無所畏、四無礙智、十八不共法、大慈大悲，亦教人行四無所畏乃至大慈大悲，讚歎行四無所畏乃至大慈大悲法，歡喜讚歎行四無所畏乃至大慈大悲者。

src_original: ye cānye sattvā abhijñā pratilabdhās,  teṣāṃ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena.  ātmanā ca daśatathāgatabalāni paripūrayitavyāni,  pare ca daśatathāgatabaleṣu samādāpayitavyā,  daśānāṃ ca tathāgatabalānāṃ varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,  ye cānye sattvā daśatathāgatabalāni paripūrayanti,
tgt_original: 自逆順觀十二因緣，亦教人逆順觀十二因緣，讚歎逆順觀十二因緣法，歡喜讚歎逆順觀十二因緣者。

src_original: ātmanā ca mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā ca paripūrayitavyā,  pare ca mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ ca samādāpayitavyā,  mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇāyāś ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,  ye cānye mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇāṃ ca paripūrayanti, (PSP_4:139)  teṣāṃ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena.
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩欲成就阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，自應知苦、斷集、滅證、修道，亦教人知苦、斷集、滅證、修道，讚歎知苦、斷集、滅證、修道法，歡喜讚歎知苦、斷集、滅證、修道者。

src_original: ātmanā canulomapratilomapratītyasamutpādaḥ samāpattavyaḥ,  pare cānulomapratilomapratītyasamutpāde samādāpayitavyāḥ,  anulomapratilomapratītyasamutpādasamāpatteś ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,  ye cānye anulomapratilomapratītyasamutpādaṃ samāpadyante,  teṣāṃ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena.
tgt_original: 自生須陀洹果證智而不證實際，亦教人著須陀洹果中，讚歎須陀洹果法，歡喜讚歎得須陀洹果者；

src_original: ātmanā ca srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai jñānam utpādayati na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti,  parāṃś ca srotaāpattiphalajñānasākṣātkriyāyai samādāpayati,  srotaāpattiphalajñānasākṣātkriyāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate,  ye cānye srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai jñānam utpādayanti,  teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
tgt_original: 自生辟支佛道證知而不證辟支佛道，亦教人著辟支佛道中，讚歎辟支佛道法，歡喜讚歎得辟支佛道者。

src_original: parāṃś ca pratyekabuddhaphalajñānasākṣātkriyāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati,  pratyekabuddhaphalajñānasākṣātkriyāyāś (PSP_4:140)  ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate,  ye cānye pratyekabuddhaphalajñānasākṣātkriyāyai jñānam utpādayanti,  teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. iti madhyā kṣāntiḥ
tgt_original: 自淨佛世界、成就眾生，亦教人淨佛世界、成就眾生，讚歎淨佛世界、成就眾生法，歡喜讚歎淨佛世界、成就眾生者。

src_original: ātmanā ca bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmati,  parāṃś ca bodhisattvanyāmāvakrāntyāṃ samādāpayati,  bodhisattvanyāmāvakrānteś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate,  ye cānye bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmanti,  teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.  evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau niryātukāmena sthātavyam. ity adhimātrā kṣāntiḥ
tgt_original: 自起菩薩神通，亦教人起菩薩神通，讚歎起菩薩神通法，歡喜讚歎起菩薩神通者。

src_original: ātmanā ca sattvān paripācayati,  parāṃś ca sattvaparipākāya samādāpayati,  sattvaparipākasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate,  ye cānye sattvaparipākāyābhyudgatās,  teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.  ātmanā ca buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati,
tgt_original: 自生一切種智，亦教人生一切種智，讚歎生一切種智法，歡喜讚歎生一切種智者。

src_original: parāṃś ca buddhakṣetrapariśodhanāya samādāpayati,  buddhakṣetrapariśuddheś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate,  ye cānye buddhakṣetrapariśodhanāya pratiṣṭhitās,  teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. iti mṛdavo 'gradharmāḥ
tgt_original: 自斷一切結使習，亦教人斷一切結使習，讚歎斷一切結使習法，歡喜讚歎斷一切結使習者。

src_original: sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate,  ye cānye sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān prajahati,  teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.  ātmanā ca āyuḥsaṃpadaṃ parigṛhṇāti,  parāṃś ca āyuḥsaṃpadi samādāpayati,  āyuḥsaṃpadaś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate,  ye cānye mahāpuruṣā āyuḥsaṃpadi sthitās,  teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩欲成就阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，自取壽命成就，亦教人取壽命成就，讚歎取壽命成就法，歡喜讚歎取壽命成就者。

src_original: ātmanā ca saddharmasthitiṃ parigṛhṇāti,  parāṃś ca saddharmasthitau (PSP_4:141)  samādāpayati,  saddharmasthiteś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate ye cānye saddharmasthitiṃ parigṛhṇanti,  teṣāñ ca mahāpuruṣarṣabhāṇāṃ varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
tgt_original: 自成就法住，亦教人成就法住，讚歎成就法住法，歡喜讚歎成就法住者。

src_original: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau niryātukāmena  bhavitavyam. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām upāyakauśalye
tgt_original: 須菩提！ 菩薩摩訶薩欲成就阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，應如是行，亦應如是學般若波羅蜜方便力！

src_original: ca sthātavyam. tasyaivaṃ śikṣamāṇasyaivaṃ tiṣṭhataḥ,  anāvaraṇaṃ rūpaṃ bhaviṣyati anāvaraṇā vedanā anāvaraṇā saṃjñā anāvaraṇāḥ saṃskārā,
tgt_original: 是菩薩如是學、如是行時，當得無礙色，得無礙受、想、行、識，乃至得無礙法住。

src_original: sthito buddhabhūmau sthito na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsaty,
tgt_original: 阿鞞跋致菩薩摩訶薩亦如是，住阿鞞跋致地中，終不疑。

src_original: sa tatrāvinivartanīyabhūmau sthito buddhakṣetrañ ca pariśodhayati,  sattvāṃś ca paripācayaty,
tgt_original: 住是地中，淨佛世界、成就眾生。

src_original: utpannotpannāni ca mārakarmāṇi budhyate,
tgt_original: 種種魔事起，即時覺知；

src_original: na ca mārakarmāṇāṃ vaśena gacchati,
tgt_original: 亦不隨魔事，破壞魔事。

src_original: nāma subhūte puruṣa ānantaryakarmakārī ānantaryacittenāvirahito yāvan maraṇakālam  ity anuvartata eva tad ānantaryacittaṃ,  na ca tatrānantaryacittaṃ śaknoti viṣkambhayitum,
tgt_original: 譬如有人作五逆罪，五逆罪心乃至死時常逐不捨，雖有異心不能障隔。

src_original: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tad avinivartanīyacittaṃ bhūtaṃ sthitam avinivartanīyabhūmāv  avikampan tac cittaṃ,  na śakyate sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena vivartayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 阿鞞跋致菩薩摩訶薩亦如是，自住其地，心常不動，一切世間天、人、阿修羅不能動轉。 何以故？

src_original: tathā hi tad avinivartanīyacittaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuram atikramya samyaktvaniyāmam avakrāntaṃ sa svakāyāṃ bhūmau sthitvābhijñāparamapāramitāḥ prāpya buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
tgt_original: 是菩薩摩訶薩出一切世間天、人、阿修羅上，入正法位中，自證地中住。

src_original: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,  buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati,  teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu kuśalamūlāny avaropayitvā tāṃś ca buddhān bhagavataḥ paripṛcchati paripraśnayati paryupāste.
tgt_original: 具足諸菩薩神通，能淨佛世界、成就眾生，從一佛界至一佛界，於十方佛所，殖諸善根，親近、諮問諸佛。

src_original: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tathā sthitaḥ,  sa māna utpannotpannāni ca mārakarmāṇy avabudhyate,
tgt_original: 是菩薩如是住，種種魔事起，覺而不隨；

src_original: utpannotpannānāñ ca mārakarmāṇāṃ vaśena na gacchati,  tāni ca mārakarmāṇy upāyakauśalyena bhūtakoṭīḥ śodhayati,
tgt_original: 以方便力處魔事著實際中；

src_original: svakāyāñ ca bhūmau na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 自證地中，不疑、不悔。 何以故？

src_original: tathā hi sa niḥkāṅkṣo bhūtakoṭyāḥ,  na bhūtakoṭim ekāṃ vā dve vā vikalpayati,
tgt_original: 實際中無疑相故，知是實際非一非二。

src_original: tasya jātivinivṛttasyāpi na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau cittam utpadyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 以是因緣故，是人乃至轉身終不向聲聞、辟支佛地。

src_original: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu na kasyacid dharmasyotpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā saṃkleśaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ vā samanupaśyati. iti mārge dharmajñānam
tgt_original: 是菩薩摩訶薩諸法自相空中不見法若生若滅、若垢若淨。

src_original: jātivinivṛttasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati,  nāhaṃ nābhisaṃbhotsye 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim,  abhisaṃbhotsya evāham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 是菩薩摩訶薩乃至轉身亦不疑我當得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提、若不得。 何以故？

src_original: tathā hi subhūte svalakṣaṇaśūnyā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.  sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sthitaḥ svakāyāṃ bhūmāv,
tgt_original: 須菩提！ 諸法自相空，即是阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。 須菩提！

src_original: aparapratyayaḥ svakāyāṃ bhūmāv,  anavamardanīyaḥ svakāyāṃ bhūmau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 是菩薩摩訶薩住自證地中，不隨他語，無能壞者。 何以故？

src_original: tathā hi subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sthito 'saṃhāryeṇa jñānena samanvāgato bhavati.
tgt_original: 是阿鞞跋致菩薩摩訶薩成就不動智慧故。 須菩提！ 以是行、類、相貌，當知是名阿鞞跋致菩薩摩訶薩。

src_original: sacet khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
tgt_original: 「復次，須菩提！ 是菩薩摩訶薩若惡魔作佛身來，語菩薩言：

src_original: 'haiva tvam arhattvaṃ prāpnu hi,
tgt_original: 『汝今於是間取阿羅漢道。

src_original: na tvaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ saroyaksaṃbodhau,  na ca tvayānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdho,  yena tvaṃ vyākriyathās tais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,  na ca tvayi te ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni saṃvidyante,  yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākriyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
tgt_original: 汝亦無阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記，汝亦未得無生法忍，汝亦無是阿鞞跋致行、類、相貌，亦無是相得受阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。 』須菩提！

src_original: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tad vacanaṃ śrutvā nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,  na ca cittasyānyathā tvaṃ bhavati veditavyaṃ,
tgt_original: 若菩薩摩訶薩聞是語，心不異、不沒、不驚、不畏；

src_original: subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vyākṛto 'haṃ tais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 是菩薩應自知： 『我必從諸佛受阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。 何以故？

src_original: tathā hi mama te dharmāḥ saṃvidyante yair dharmair bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākriyante 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. iti mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ
tgt_original: 諸菩薩以是法受記，我亦有是法得受記。

src_original: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:  mārādhiṣṭhito vā puruṣaḥ śrāvakatve tvaṃ kulaputra vyākṛto na tvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,  kiṃ te 'nuttarayā samyaksaṃbodhyā.
tgt_original: 』須菩提！ 若惡魔、若為魔所使作佛形像來，與菩薩受聲聞、辟支佛記。

src_original: sacet subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ bhaviṣyati,
tgt_original: 須菩提！ 是菩薩作是念：

src_original: māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkrānto mārādhiṣṭhito vā puruṣo,
tgt_original: 『是惡魔、若為魔所使作佛形像來語。

src_original: saced ayam asya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
tgt_original: 惡魔作佛身來到菩薩所，作是言：

src_original: naitad buddhabhāṣitaṃ na śrāvakair mārabhāṣitāny etāni sūtrāṇi yatra tvaṃ carasi. veditavyam etad bodhisattvena mahāsattvena māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān mārādhiṣṭhito vā puruṣo,
tgt_original: 『汝所學經書非佛所說、亦非聲聞說，是魔所說。 』須菩提！ 是菩薩摩訶薩當作是知：

src_original: yo mām amuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher vivecayati. veditavyam etat subhūte vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ taiḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair (PSP_4:162)  arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sthito 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyāyāṃ bhūmau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 『是惡魔、若魔所使，教我遠離阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。 』須菩提！ 當知是菩薩已為過去佛所受記，住阿鞞跋致地。 何以故？
